item.title: Selenium with Kubernetes
item.description: Background I’ve read and heard a lot about Selenium over the years, but never got my hands dirty. It’s been on my ‘todo’ list for a fair while! This blog topic is a good excuse to cover off a few learning points: Get an automated test running in a local k3d cluster to generate some traffic when testing progressive deployments with Argo-rollouts Investigate the options for running Selenium in K8s and how it can scale Write some Python!
